# transient

**Type Property**

The window floats in Spaces and hides in Mission Control.

## Declaration

```swift
static var transient: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the default behavior if `windowLevel` isn’t equal to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/Level-swift.struct/normal].

## Spaces and Mission Control

- **managed**: The window participates in Mission Control and Spaces.
